mapper.select: select cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 ROWNUM , B.gdsNum , B.gdsName , B.cateCode , B.gdsPrice , B.gdsStock , B.gdsDes , B.gdsImg , B.gdsThumbImg FROM tbl_goods B,(SELECT @rownum:=0) R where B.gdsNum>=0 ORDER BY B.gdsNum DESC

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 ROWNUM , B.gdsNum , B.gdsName , B.cateCode , B.gdsPrice , B.gdsStock , B.gdsDes , B.gdsImg , B.gdsThumbImg , MF.ORG_FILE_NAME file , MF.FILE_PATH file_src , MF.SEQ_MP_FILE_NO file_no FROM tbl_goods B,(SELECT @rownum:=0) R left outer join MP_FILE MF on MF.BNO=#{gdsNum} where B.gdsNum=#{gdsNum}
